price: ហើយជាការពិតណាស់ យើងបានប្រទានឱ្យមូសានូវគម្ពីរ (តាវរ៉ត) សង្ឃឹមថាពួកគេនឹងទទួលបានការចង្អុលបង្ហាញ។
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba laʿallahum yahtadūna
